scripts.start: set NODE_ENV=development&& set VITE_PORT=8100&& npm run dev
scripts.start:mac: export NODE_ENV=development&& export VITE_PORT=8100&& npm run dev
scripts.build:server: npm run build:vite && npm run build:electron
scripts.build:server:mac: npm run build:vite && npm run build:electron:mac
scripts.build:electron: set NODE_ENV=production&& electron-builder install-app-deps && electron-builder --config build/electron-builder.json --win
scripts.build:electron:mac: export NODE_ENV=production&& electron-builder install-app-deps && electron-builder --config build/electron-builder.json --mac
